scripts.build: browserify src/app.js --outfile public/bundle.js -d -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.build-watch: watchify src/app.js --outfile public/bundle.js -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.dev: npm run build-watch & npm run live-reload & npm run serve-dev
scripts.dev-console: npm run build-watch & npm run run-watch
